data.title: Nicole PREVOST
data.text:
Birthca 1729, Natchitoches Par., LA886,887,1546,1547,576

Death22 Sep 1765, Pointe Coupée Par., LA1548,1549,779,576

Burial23 Sep 1765, Pointe Coupée Par., LA582,1550,576

ReligionRoman Catholic

ID No.396.03

SurnamePrevost

ResidenceNatchitoches Par., LA; Pointe Coupée Par., LA - 1745-1765

FatherNicolas PREVOST dit Collet (1700-<1759)

MotherYves DUBOS (1707-1784)

Notes for Nicole PREVOST

Witnesses at the marriage of François Mayeux and Nicole Prevost on 11 February 1745 in Pointe Coupée Parish, LA were Pierre Mayhieux (father of the groom), Marie Françoise Manne (his step-mother), Nicolas Provost called Collet (father of the bride), Dame Juen Dubos, Trenonay Chanfret, Meullion, Joseph Herbert, Paul Moro, Jean Joseph Delfau de Pontalba (Commandant of the Pointe Coupée Post) and Pierre Duroche905,886,887,888,877.

____________________

Pierre Prevost and Nicole Prevost, wife of François Mayeux, were the godparents at the baptism of Catherine Durocher, daughter of Pierre Durocher and Catherine Josephe Guichard, on 13 June 1746 in Pointe Coupée Parish, LA895,1541,1529,1542.

____________________

Nicole Prevost and Joseph Hebert were godparents at the baptism of Nicole’s brother Nicolas Prevost, son of Nicolas Prevost and Yves Dubos, on 5 October 1740 in Pointe Coupée Parish, LA582,1572,1529,1573,1532.

____________________

Nicole Prevost and Jean François Allain were godparents at the baptism of Marianne Guiot, daughter of Pierre Guiot and Marie Anne Poche, on 15 November 1744 in Pointe Coupée Parish, LA1574,1575,1529,1576.

____________________

In the Census of Pointe Coupée, Louisiana on 20 December 1745, François Mahyeux is listed as 22 years of age, married to Nicole Prevost (16 years of age) and has no children. He had 2 black slaves (an adult male and a girl). He had no horses, 5 cattle, 2 hogs, 1 musket, no pistols, 2 pounds of powder, 3 pounds of lead & balls; 400 bushels of corn, no beans, 5 units of tobacco and 18 arpents of cultivated land.1546,1577

Questions/Errors notes for Nicole PREVOST

The year of marriage of Pierre François Mayeux and Nicole Prevost is given as 11 February 1744905,1578,888 in some sources and as 11 February 17451552,581,886,887 in other sources. Since the source quoting the actual church record of the marriage states that the marriage occurred on 11 February 1745, I have used this date.

Notes for Pierre-François (Spouse 1)

In the 1731 Census of Louisiana (Census of Residences the Length of the River) Pierre Mayeux is listed at "Mayeux" at the Mayeux habitation. At his home are one woman, three children, no indentured workers, one man capable of bearing arms, one Negro slave, no Negro children, no Indian slaves, no horses, one horned beef, no goats or sheep, no kid sheep and one gun.842,843

____________________

Witnesses at the marriage of François Mayeux and Nicole Prevost on 11 February 1745 in Pointe Coupée Parish, LA were Pierre Mayhieux (father of the groom), Marie Françoise Manne (his step-mother), Nicolas Provost called Collet (father of the bride), Dame Juen Dubos, Trenonay Chanfret, Meullion, Joseph Herbert, Paul Moro, Jean Joseph Delfau de Pontalba (Commandant of the Pointe Coupée Post) and Pierre Duroche905,886,887,888,877.

____________________

In the Census of Pointe Coupée, Louisiana on 20 December 1745, François Mahyeux is listed as 22 years of age, married to Nicole Prevost (16 years of age) and has no children. He had 2 black slaves (an adult male and a girl). He had no horses, 5 cattle, 2 hogs, 1 musket, no pistols, 2 pounds of powder, 3 pounds of lead & balls; 400 bushels of corn, no beans, 5 units of tobacco and 18 arpents of cultivated land.1546,1577

____________________

Pierre François Mayeux, an inhabitant of this area, and Marie Colon, wife of Antoine Sarrazin, were godparents at the baptism of Cecille Le Doux, daughter of Pierre Le Doux and Cecille Rondeau, on 16 February 1749 at Pointe Coupée Parish, LA832,1551.

Questions/Errors notes for Pierre-François (Spouse 1)

The year of marriage of Pierre François Mayeux and Nicole Prevost is given as 11 February 1744905,1578,888 in some sources and as 11 February 17451552,581,886,887 in other sources. Since the source quoting the actual church record of the marriage states that the marriage occurred on 11 February 1745, I have used this date.
